scripts.env:pull:main: mkdir -p ./dev/.envs && npx dotenv-vault pull main ./dev/.envs/.env --yes && rm -f ./dev/.envs/.env.previous
scripts.env:pull:dev: mkdir -p ./dev/.envs && npx dotenv-vault pull dev ./dev/.envs/.env.dev --yes && rm -f ./dev/.envs/.env.dev.previous
scripts.env:pull:ci: mkdir -p ./dev/.envs && npx dotenv-vault pull ci ./dev/.envs/.env.ci --yes && rm -f ./dev/.envs/.env.ci.previous
scripts.env:pull:stage: mkdir -p ./dev/.envs && npx dotenv-vault pull stage ./dev/.envs/.env.stage --yes && rm -f ./dev/.envs/.env.stage.previous
scripts.env:pull:prod: mkdir -p ./dev/.envs && npx dotenv-vault pull prod ./dev/.envs/.env.prod --yes && rm -f ./dev/.envs/.env.prod.previous
scripts.envs:push: npm run env:push:main && npm run env:push:dev && npm run env:push:ci && npm run env:push:stage && npm run env:push:prod
scripts.envs:pull: npm run env:pull:main && npm run env:pull:dev && npm run env:pull:ci && npm run env:pull:stage && npm run env:pull:prod
scripts.envs:setup: npx dotenv-vault login --yes && npx dotenv-vault build --yes && npx dotenv-vault open --yes && npm run envs:pull
scripts.envs:setup:new: rm -rf ./.env.me && rm -rf ./.env.vault && rm -rf ./dev/.envs && npx dotenv-vault new --yes && npm run envs:setup
